title: Riot Changed ARAM RANDOM to robot player
body: I feel like I am playing with robot team. let me ask why do they change to afk player to bot ?

replies.body: We don't have the ability to change someone who goes AFK into a bot player. More than likely, that person was being played entirely by a script, in which case you can flag them for investigation by hitting the report button in the post-game lobby.
Also i rather have them afk than turning them in a bot. Bots are just free gold en exp.
